dict.acceptation: 世俗的；外行的；没有经验的；

sent.orig: Offside lay: The side lay opposite the operating side of a press. See Lay, Nearside Lay.
sent.trans: 右标针：在操作边对面的横标针。参阅标针，左标针。

sent.orig: Bill: Well, black hens can lay white eggs, but white hens can't lay black eggs.
sent.trans: 比尔：嗯，黑母鸡能下白蛋，而白母鸡不能下黑蛋。

sent.orig: And we lay, we lay together just not.
sent.trans: 我们躺着我们躺在一起只是不。

sent.orig: Lay by the sea, bury all of your fear, Lady lay.
sent.trans: 让大海将？盟？械目志迓裨？女士。

sent.orig: He lay still, as if his soul lay amid cool waters, conscious of faint sweet music.
sent.trans: 他静静地躺着，仿佛他的灵魂躺在清凉的水中，感受着微弱的甜蜜的音乐。
